name: Sweet Dano Bubble Pop
description:
Sweet Dano Bubble Pop is the most popular game in bubble games. You can find different shooting games and bubble shooter games, but it still difficult to find a unique classic bubble shooter game. And it is normal.
How to play

• The goal is the same in all game mods
• You make the bubble pop when connecting at least 3
• Drag your finger from on the screen and then shoot
• The line will help you to shoot accurately
